description: Ryuuhou, the son of the legendary Bronze Saint Dragon Shiryuu, returns to the Palaestra after a short absence. The young Saint apprentices are subjected to a strict training to master their Cosmo element. Kouga is later forced to battle Ryuuhou in an intense element-to-element duel.

titles.title: Eiyuu no Musuko! Ryuuhou Tai Kouga!
Le fils d`un héros. Ryuho contre Koga !
The Son of a Hero! Ryuuhou Versus Kouga
英雄の息子! 龍峰対光牙!
